subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. said 18 seconds were incorrectly run off the clock late in the fourth quarter of Pittsburgh’s last-minute 24-20 victory at San Diego.
snippet: The N.F.L. said 18 seconds were incorrectly run off the clock late in the fourth quarter of Pittsburgh’s last-minute 24-20 victory at San Diego.
